00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 using System.Xml;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.APMLHelper
00029 {
00033     public class Concept
00034     {
00035         #region Constructors
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039         public Concept()
00040         {
00041         }
00042 
00047         public Concept(XmlElement Element)
00048         {
00049             if (Element.Name.Equals("concept", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00050             {
00051                 if (Element.Attributes["key"] != null)
00052                 {
00053                     Key = Element.Attributes["key"].Value;
00054                 }
00055                 if (Element.Attributes["value"] != null)
00056                 {
00057                     Value = float.Parse(Element.Attributes["value"].Value);
00058                 }
00059                 if (Element.Attributes["from"] != null)
00060                 {
00061                     From = Element.Attributes["from"].Value;
00062                 }
00063                 if (Element.Attributes["updated"] != null)
00064                 {
00065                     Updated = DateTime.Parse(Element.Attributes["updated"].Value);
00066                 }
00067             }
00068         }
00069         #endregion
00070 
00071         #region Properties
00072 
00073 
00074 
00075         public string Key
00076         {
00077             get { return _Key; }
00078             set { _Key = value; }
00079         }
00080         private string _Key = "";
00081 
00085         public float Value
00086         {
00087             get { return _Value; }
00088             set { _Value = value; }
00089         }
00090         private float _Value = 1.0f;
00091 
00095         public string From
00096         {
00097             get { return _From; }
00098             set { _From = value; }
00099         }
00100         private string _From = "";
00101 
00105         public DateTime Updated
00106         {
00107             get { return _Updated; }
00108             set { _Updated = value; }
00109         }
00110         private DateTime _Updated = DateTime.Now;
00111         #endregion
00112 
00113         #region Overriden Functions
00114         public override string ToString()
00115         {
00116             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00117             if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(From))
00118             {
00119                 Builder.Append("<Concept key=\"" + Key + "\" value=\"" + Value + "\" from=\"" + From + "\" updated=\"" + Updated.ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ") + "\" />");
00120             }
00121             else
00122             {
00123                 Builder.Append("<Concept key=\"" + Key + "\" value=\"" + Value + "\" />");
00124             }
00125             return Builder.ToString();
00126         }
00127         #endregion
00128     }
00129 }
